description: Connect, disconnect and switch modes of a connection to Cloudflare's WARP service. WARP is a VPN that encrypts traffic for privacy, security, and speed. See also: fastd, ivpn, mozillavpn, mullvad. More information: https://developers.cloudflare.com/warp-client/.

useCases.description: Register the current device to WARP (must be run before first connection):
